scripts.dev: concurrently -n server,web -c magenta,cyan "bun run dev:server" "bun run dev:web"
scripts.dev:desktop: concurrently -k -n web,desktop -c cyan,magenta "bun run --cwd apps/web dev" "bun run --cwd apps/desktop dev"
scripts.build:desktop: bun run build:web && bun run build:server:bundle && bun run --cwd apps/desktop prepare:resources && bun run --cwd apps/desktop build
scripts.dist:desktop: bun run build:desktop && bun run --cwd apps/desktop dist
